content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GrantRawLogAccess path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1alpha/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/raw_log_access/{ip} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name ip
desc the ip or cidr with mask /32 to grant access to waf raw logs
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum grant raw log access
desc blockcallout

  type danger
  body this is an alpha api call and should be considered very unstable please do not execute this in a production environment see our versioning guidelinesdocversioning for more information

/block

grant raw log access to an ip or extend its expiration date if it is already granted
responses
200
wafgrantrawlogaccessresponse
type obj
wafrawlogaccessip
type obj
props
ip
type str
desc the ip or cidr with access to waf raw logs
expiryat
type str
format datetime
desc the date an access to waf raw logs will expire
desc information about ip or cidr with access to waf raw logs
desc a response from a request to grant raw log access
title: 19_Raw Log Access_GrantRawLogAccess_105.json
